column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Pizza and ambiance were good but the service was TERRIBLE!  The servers were standing there watching football on the tv.  Once our waitress gave us our pizza
column2: she didn't come back once even though we needed water and more napkins.  Once it was time to pay
column3: we had to track her down and hand her our credit card.  We won't be back!
